name: evaluate
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool mathematical_symbolic_expression_manipulator.
Tool description: Mathematical Symbolic Expression Manipulator
API description: Evaluates a mathematical expression using the given variables and their values through the RapidAPI service.

variables.description: A comma-separated string listing the variables used in the expression.

values.description: A comma-separated string listing the values corresponding to the variables.

expression.description: The mathematical expression to be evaluated.
